mapper.select:
select ID,Hybh,Qymc,Qyzj,Glfwf,Qysf,Qydf,Ssyhd,Sbyhd,Shjyl,Dhjyl,Qymj,Hjje,Shzt,Fbzt,Jfyd,Dsyhd,Dbyhd,Zydy,Zjsq,Glfsq,Sfsq,Dfsq,Zjbz,Glfbz,Sfbz,Dfbz,Zlbzj,Zxyj,Glfwfdj,Qyzjdj,Zlbzjdj,Zxyjdj,Qyzjznj,Glfwfznj,Qysfznj,Zlbzjznj,Zxyjznj,Qydfznj,Hjjedx,Zlbzjsq,Zxyjsq,Zlbzjbz,Zxyjbz,Hjjeznj,Bz,Qydfdj,Qysfdj from member_rental where 1 = 1
and qymc like CONCAT('%', #{fhymc}, '%')
and Jfyd = #{fjfyd}
order by id desc

select * from member_rental where Id in
#{item}
